page.title: 10LEISURE - SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content: {Senior Citizens}too are well catered for in the community and they have their own club. Every Thursday at 2.00 p.m. they collect together at the Community{Centre}and play{whist, {dominoes, cards and bingo} At 3.00 p.m. they stop for tea and biscuits and one of the ladies goes round to collect 20p which goes towards day trips out to places like{Blackpool, {Buxton}and{Llandudno.} Each year Mrs. Simm, who is also one of our dinner ladies at school, arranges one weeks holiday. This year they are going to{Scarborough. A{Residential Home}for the elderly has recently been opened in what was formerly the vicarage. Links between the residents and local school children have been developed.
